name: wool felted slippers
notes:
this is a pattern for wool felted crochet slippers! 

**sizes:**
it includes a range of sizes from women's 6/men's 4.5 - women's 13/men's 11.5 (us)

**materials:**
lion brand wool-ease roving origins, 100% wool
3.75 mm hook

**resources:**
youtube video tutorial for the full pattern including stitching and felting instructions here: [https://youtu.be/dcrejkixxia?si=qrgvjofuro9tkzov][1]
stitching - 9:45
felting - 23:49

**other notes:**
instructions on how to felt and shrink the slippers included at the end of the pdf. you must use 100% wool, non-superwash yarn in order for these to felt correctly!

enjoy!


  [1]: https://youtu.be/dcrejkixxia?si=qrgvjofuro9tkzov
